newsitem.title: USA: Weekend U.S. Box Office Chart - Aug 30-Sept 2.
newsitem.headline: Weekend U.S. Box Office Chart - Aug 30-Sept 2.

text.p: Following are final data for the top 10 movies at the August 30-September 2 holiday weekend box office, according to Exhibitor Relations Co. Inc.

NOTE: "The Crow: City of Angels" and "Emma" are released by Miramax Films, a unit of Walt Disney Co.. "Tin Cup" and "A Time To Kill" are released by Time Warner Inc.'s Warner Bros. "First Kid" and "Jack" are released by Disney. "The Island Of Dr. Moreau" is released by New Line Cinema, a unit of Turner Broadcasting System Inc.. "Independence Day" is released by News Corp.'s 20th Century Fox. "A Very Brady Sequel" is released by Viacom Inc.'s Paramount Pictures. "The Fan" is released by Sony Corp..
